resource: 1003141.1002622.description=In order to confirm operation, the BSM outside rearview mirror indicators illuminate in the following situations:• When the “POWER” switch is turned to ON mode while the BSM main switch is set to ON.• When the BSM main switch is set to ON while the “POWER”switch is in ON mode.If the system is functioning correctly, the BSM outside rearview mirror indicators will turn off after a few seconds.If the BSM outside rearview mirror indicators do not illuminate or do not turn off, there may be a malfunction with the system.If this occurs, have the vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer. 1003141.vtc=true 1003141.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003141.description=In order to confirm operation, the BSM outside rearview mirror indicators illuminate in the following situations:• When the “POWER” switch is turned to ON mode while the BSM main switch is set to ON.• When the BSM main switch is set to ON while the “POWER”switch is in ON mode.If the system is functioning correctly, the BSM outside rearview mirror indicators will turn off after a few seconds.If the BSM outside rearview mirror indicators do not illuminate or do not turn off, there may be a malfunction with the system.If this occurs, have the vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer.
